#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define M 1000000007
#define lli unsigned long long
 
using namespace std;
 
lli fast_pow(lli a, lli b)
{
	lli res = 1LL;
	while ( b > 0 ) {
		if ( b & 1 ) res = (res*a)%M;
		a = (a*a)%M;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return res;
}
 
int main()
{
	int t;
	lli n,k;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while ( t-- ) {
		scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &k);
		lli base = 0, pro = 1;
		while ( 1 ) {
			if ( pro >= n ) break;
			pro *= 2LL;
			base++;
		}
		if ( pro != n ) base--;
		lli ans = fast_pow(base, k);
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
